title: Andrei Razborov
text:
Andrei Dmitriyevich Razborov (; born 19 November 1994) is a Russian <a href="association%20football">football</a> player who plays for <a href="FC%20Fakel%20Voronezh">FC Fakel Voronezh</a>.
Club career.
He made his debut in the <a href="Russian%20Football%20National%20League">Russian Football National League</a> for <a href="FC%20Fakel%20Voronezh">FC Fakel Voronezh</a> on 1 August 2020 in a game against <a href="FC%20Akron%20Tolyatti">FC Akron Tolyatti</a>, he substituted <a href="Mikhail%20Petrusyov">Mikhail Petrusyov</a> in the 66th minute.
